short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We create custom bots to help you optimize your Google business listings.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Webido Web Automation designs and build custom bots to help the businesses to optimize the Google Business Listings across multiple criteria. Our goal is to provide the businesses with the best possible customer experience by creating a custom bot that will help the businesses automate their daily tasks, including updating pricing and inventory levels, managing reviews, responding to customer messages, posting on social media channels - all with the goal of increasing sales.
